title: For you madam. [No. 67/09] = Pour vous madame
brief_description: Cinemagazine items including: 1. How to wallpaper your kitchen with adhesive paper. 2. An overview of the 25th International Leather Week Expo in Paris, including a fashion parade. 3. Francoise Chedeville, sculptor in ceramics, at work in her studio. 4. The performance of Mozart’s opera, Apollo and Hyacinth.
